Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.world

Interface RegionBasedStorage<R extends StorageChunk>

Type Parameters:
R - the type of chunk-section data to be stored.
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
UnloadingRegionBasedStorage
public interface RegionBasedStorage<R extends StorageChunk> extends AutoCloseable
Describes something that can store chunk-sections worth of data.

    Gets a chunk section at the given location or null one does not exist there.

    Indicates to this that a world chunk is being loaded and that the corresponding chunk pillar should be loaded here as well.

    Indicates to this that a world chunk is being unloaded and that the corresponding chunk pillar should be scheduled for unloading here as well.

    Forcefully saves all chunks, but leaves them loaded.

    Forcefully saves a specific chunk, but leaves it loaded.

    • onWorldChunkLoad

      default void onWorldChunkLoad(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos pos)
      Indicates to this that a world chunk is being loaded and that the corresponding chunk pillar should be loaded here as well.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the world chunk that is being loaded.

    • onWorldChunkUnload

      default void onWorldChunkUnload(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos pos)
      Indicates to this that a world chunk is being unloaded and that the corresponding chunk pillar should be scheduled for unloading here as well.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the world chunk that is being unloaded.

    • getIfExists

      @Nullable R getIfExists(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkSectionPos pos)
      Gets a chunk section at the given location or null one does not exist there.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the chunk section.
      Returns:
      the retrieved chunk section, or null if none could be retrieved.
